entry.title: Generating web with AI - state of the art?

link.title: Generating web with AI - state of the art?

entry.content:
Generating web with AI

Objectives

I would like to speed-up UI prototyping so that I can go from a prompt to code real fast.

Specifically I wanted to design a webpage given this specification:

TLDR (full brief in the appendix)

Search engine simplifying the process of finding pharmacies with specific medicines. Page 1: Search by medicine name and view results with in-stock indicators. Sort results by distance. Page 2: Medicine detail showing which pharmacies have it in stock, with info about each pharmacy (address, opening hours.)

I‚Äôve briefly explored several approaches

  • specialized tools
  • ChatGPT
  • Figma plugins

Specialized tools

From 4 random articles titled ‚Äú10 best tools for AI design‚Äù I‚Äôve picked solutions matching my problem.

Verdict

  • overall failure in helping my use-case
  • most tools have preconceived idea of web structure
  • tools are probably designed for people who could not otherwise build a web and so their needs don‚Äôt match mine (missing exports, etc)

Snappy.appypie.com

  • Platform purpose: ‚ÄúCreate powerful web and mobile applications and automate workflows easily and quickly without any coding.‚Äù
  • Generates a site based on prompt (without word limit).
  • The output is more of a wireframe, purposed for a phone resolution.

Uizard.io üëç

  • First real generator (28 USD per month).
  • Takes a 300-character description prompt and 150-character design requirements.
  • Pros: generates several screens with components, creates a prototype with pages linked together. Users generative model to create images. The result is editable (Figma-like).
  • Cons: most of UX is hallucinations, none of it is actually usable as a finished product; components are recycled (across completely different prompts), does not adhere to constraints (i.e. design 2 pages). Can only be exported as PDF, PNG, and JPEG.

‚¨áÔ∏è Result for prompt asking for completely something different, spot 10 similarities..

Durable.co

  • AI website builder with tons of other services (marketing, CRM, invoicing) placing it outside my use-case
  • Generates a site based on industry and name (can suggest one) - can be hacked by sending description prompt in the industry field.
  • No prompt customization.
  • Produces average quality visuals, but structure seems the same - hero, image, service cards, testimonial, gallery, contact info and form.

Wix.com

  • Claims ‚ÄúAI technology that creates a site for you.‚Äù
  • Could not find AI designer.

Debuild.app

  • Joined waiting list.

10Web.io

  • AI web design.
  • Input: describe business and 3 key services.
  • Generates OK design (responsive), but does not adhere to the prompt (no search input, etc.).
  • Seems more like the layout and structure is preconceived (home, service, about and contact pages) and AI only generates texts and images.
  • Output > https://10web-site.ai/52/working-troll/

Sketch2Code (Microsoft)

  • Site not available https://sketch2code.azurewebsites.net/.

Overall, none of these tools can help me achieve my goal of designing a simple site based on my prompt.

ChatGPT

Approach

  • get GPT to generate code using Bootstrap

The result is closer to what I need, but it obviously needs more work to be useful.

Figma plugin

Using figma to code plugins, one can achieve interesting results. The downside is that you need the Figma design‚Ä¶

Input:

Output:

Appendix

Full spec

The MediSearch platform serves as a user-friendly medicine search engine that simplifies the process of finding pharmacies with specific medicines in stock. The website is theme is predominantly violet and features exquisite use of color gradients.

Homepage(Search and Result List): On the homepage, we offer users the ability to search for medicines based on their names. Typing in the search bar, results begin to appear in a list where each row distinctively displays a combination of the medicine name and form (e.g., Coldrex Sacks, Coldrex Tablets 50mg). A keen eye would notice an in-stock indicator icon next to each medicine to swiftly inform of its availability status. Results can be further honed based on users‚Äô convenience as they have the option to sort these results by distance from their pre-estimated location.

Medicine Detail Page: Post choosing a medicine from the list, users are redirected to a medicine detail page containing an array of pharmacy cards. Each card leaves no stone unturned in providing all necessary information about a pharmacy ‚Äì its name, address, phone number, and operation hours. Further, a compactly fitting map ensures users do not have to scour the internet for directions.

Email Subscription Page: In unfortunate circumstances where a user‚Äôs required medicine is out of stock in all pharmacies, we offer a silver lining - an option to subscribe for email notifications about the medicine‚Äôs availability status.

GPT prompt

You are a web developer with design capabilities. You will take a description (see below), enhance it by inserting details written in between the lines and based on the enhanced description build the html code split to individual pages.

Website description:

Design requirements:

Here are a few rules to observe:

  • output complete HTML using Slim lang syntax
  • use Bootstrap as the CSS framework, its components and utility classes
  • make sure you properly place elements (by adding padding / margin as necessary)
  • when relevant use icons (for example state indicators, input field icons (email, phone, location, etc.)
  • use (but don‚Äôt overuse) primary color for main actions and secondary color for other actions
  • when designing sub-pages, include bread crumbs
  • include aria roles and attributes for accessibility

uizard.io prompt

Search engine simplifying the process of finding pharmacies with specific medicines. Page 1: Search by medicine name and view results with in-stock indicators. Sort results by distance. Page 2: Medicine detail showing which pharmacies have it in stock, with info about each pharmacy (address, opening hours.)

There was another one I was trying but was lost in time..

entry.title: Spot≈ôeba fosiln√≠ch paliv jako zdroj≈Ø energie v ƒåR

link.title: Spot≈ôeba fosiln√≠ch paliv jako zdroj≈Ø energie v ƒåR

entry.content:
Jak√° je spot≈ôeba energi√≠ v ƒåR?

Chtƒõl jsem si udƒõlat ≈ô√°dovou p≈ôedstavu o energetick√Ωch po≈æadavc√≠ch ƒåesk√© Republiky. Mluv√≠ se o stavbƒõ dal≈°√≠ho bloku Temel√≠nu, o nahrazov√°n√≠ ≈°pinav√Ωch zdroj≈Ø tƒõmi obnoviteln√Ωmi nebo n√≠zkoemisn√≠mi. Energii spot≈ôebov√°v√°me ale i jinak ne≈æ ve formƒõ elekt≈ôiny. Kdybychom mƒõli nahradit opravdu ve≈°ker√© fosiln√≠ zdroje, o jak√© mno≈æstv√≠ energie by se jednalo?

V dobƒõ, kdy jsem se t√≠mto zab√Ωval mƒõl nejbl√≠≈æe k n√°stinu ƒçl√°nek port√°lu oenergetice.cz, kter√Ω se ale d√≠v√° na glob√°ln√≠ spot≈ôebu. Pohled na spot≈ôebu z hlediska ƒåR mi p≈ôijde p≈ôedstavitelnƒõj≈°√≠ ne≈æ pohled glob√°ln√≠.

Pozdƒõji vy≈°el ƒçl√°nek na kurzy.cz, kter√Ω uv√°d√≠ spot≈ôebu v PJ (peta joulech) a analyzuje strukturu paliv a energi√≠ a jej√≠ spot≈ôebitele.

P≈ôedpokl√°dan√Ω postup:

  1. Naj√≠t zdroje dat o spot≈ôebƒõ fosiln√≠ch paliv
  2. P≈ôev√©st je na spoleƒçn√© jednotky TWh
  3. Porovnat s jednotkou v√Ωroby

Zdroj dat

Jako zdroj poslou≈æ√≠ str√°nka ƒåS√ö Spot≈ôeba paliv a energie, kde najdeme spot≈ôebu jednotliv√Ωch typ≈Ø paliv. Ji≈æ p≈ôi hled√°n√≠ zdroj≈Ø jsem si vybral rok 2020 pro kter√Ω by ji≈æ mohla b√Ωt dostupn√° data pro v≈°echny typy paliv a proto jsem zvolil z katalogu ƒåS√ö tento rok.

Katalog obsahuje spot≈ôebu paliv a el. energie dle odvƒõtv√≠. U ka≈æd√©ho typu paliva jsou uveden√© jednotky objemu (tuny, litry) a GJ jako jednotka energie.

Nƒõkter√° odvƒõtv√≠ mohou pou≈æ√≠vat fosiln√≠ zdroje jinak ne≈æ spalov√°n√≠m (v√Ωrobu tepla, elekt≈ôiny, nebo ve spalovac√≠ch motorech), nap≈ô. na farmaceutick√Ω nebo chemick√Ω pr≈Ømysl. Oƒçi≈°tƒõn√≠ o tato odvƒõtv√≠ jsem ale neprovedl, proto≈æe mi spot≈ôeba mimo spalov√°n√≠ nep≈ôi≈°la v√Ωznamn√°. Jako p≈ô√≠klad jsem si vybral nejvƒõt≈°√≠ polo≈æku spot≈ôeby zemn√≠ho plynu - odvƒõtv√≠ ‚ÄúV√Ωroba chemick√Ωch l√°tek a chemick√Ωch p≈ô√≠pravk≈Ø‚Äù spot≈ôebovalo cca 7% plynu, co≈æ ≈ô√°dovƒõ neovlivn√≠ ƒç√≠slo, ke kter√©mu se chci dostat.

Zpƒõtnƒõ jsem se pod√≠val na ostatn√≠ typy paliv - koks a ƒçern√© uhl√≠, kde je situace podobn√°.

P≈ôevod jednotek

U v≈°ech surovin byly uveden ekvivalent v GJ (giga joulech). Proto≈æe jsem chtƒõl vƒõdƒõt, kolik el. energie by muselo b√Ωt vyprodukov√°no pro n√°hradu fosiln√≠ch paliv, pot≈ôeboval jsem GJ p≈ôev√©st na TWh (tera-watt hodiny). 1 W = 1 joule / sek., tak≈æe kdy≈æ vydƒõl√≠me GJ 3600, dostaneme GWh a / 1000 TWh.

Elektrickou energii jsem do energetick√© n√°roƒçnosti ned√°val, proto≈æe suroviny pro jej√≠ v√Ωrobu jsou v tabulce ji≈æ zapoƒçteny a energii z n√≠zkoemisn√≠ch zdroj≈Ø nezapoƒç√≠t√°v√°me, ta u≈æ se n√≠zkoemisnƒõ vyr√°b√≠.

V√Ωsledky

Z fosiln√≠ch paliv v ƒåR spot≈ôebujeme 780 PJ, nebo-li 216 TWh energie. ƒå√≠slo je ohromuj√≠c√≠. Pro p≈ôedstavu, je to ekvivalent:

  • 14 Temel√≠n≈Ø
  • 7x v≈°ech jadern√Ωch zdroj≈Ø v ƒåR
  • 21,7 mili√≥n≈Ø dom√°c√≠ch sol√°rn√≠ch elektr√°ren (10KWp)

Celkov√° spot≈ôeba fos. paliv v ƒåR 2020

Zdroj energie PJ TWh
hnƒõd√© uhl√≠ 352.45 97.90
zemn√≠ plyn 177.58 49.33
ƒçern√© uhl√≠ 120.11 33.36
nafta 68.21 18.95
koks 57.72 16.03
benz√≠n 4.21 1.17
brykety 0.01 0.00
Celkem 780.30 216.75

Srovn√°n√≠ s v√Ωrobou elekt≈ôiny

Na v√Ωrobu el. energie bylo pou≈æito 38% fos. paliv. 62% (kromƒõ PHM) bylo vyu≈æito pro v√Ωrobu tepla v dom√°cnostech, firm√°ch a pr≈Ømyslu.

Zdroj energie PJ TWh
el. z fosiln√≠ch zdroj≈Ø - 41
el. z ostatn√≠ch zdroj≈Ø - 41

Zdrojov√° data (Google Sheet)

Z√°vƒõr

Vzhledem k ‚Äúrychlosti‚Äù elektrifikace si lze tƒõ≈æko p≈ôedstavit, ≈æe bƒõhem kr√°tk√© doby (≈ôeknƒõme 10, nebo 20 let) bude na≈°e spot≈ôeba energi√≠ bezemisn√≠. To je urƒçitƒõ slo≈æitƒõj≈°√≠ t√©ma, proto≈æe v nƒõm hraje roli spousta faktor≈Ø - sni≈æov√°n√≠ energetick√© n√°roƒçnosti budov, zlep≈°ov√°n√≠ efektivity vyt√°pƒõn√≠, sni≈æov√°n√≠ spot≈ôeby vlivem oteplov√°n√≠, atd. To je k zamy≈°len√≠ na nƒõkdy jindy.
entry.summary: Jak√° je spot≈ôeba energi√≠ v ƒåR?
